name: Urban Explorer Posts Hero Base Photos

masks-newgeneration-unofficial.callerQuote:
"We've flagged a social media post—some urban explorer kid found what appears to be a hero team's secret base and is live-streaming the 'discovery.' They haven't connected it to any specific heroes yet, but the comments are getting close. Post has 50,000 views and climbing. We need someone to handle this QUIETLY before it blows up further."

Requirements

  • Locate the urban explorer before they reveal more
  • Contain the leak—delete footage, discredit, or negotiate
  • Assess security breach level and relocate if necessary
